content.Description: The access token from the OAuth2 flow.
The Mailchimp API key, if using API key auth instead of OAuth.
The Mailchimp data center, only requried when using API key auth.
The default start date to use for date modified replication, when available.
The user agent to send on every request.
Time for which request should wait to get response.
Used to fetch campaigns that are sent in the last x days to retrive reports_email_activity stream
